page.title: 20THE LIBRARY
page.content: The Library has got 5,364 adult non fiction, 8,149 adult fiction, 3,156 junior books making a total of 16,669 . The Library has 706 cassettes and 5826 people have tickets . The Library is 14 years old and was built on the cricket ground. There was a trailer Library on the site before this Library was here.The biggest book is the Encyclopaedia Brittanica and smallest is the Observer series. The oldest book is the{EAST CHESHIRE:PAST {AND PRESENT}which is by{J.P.EARWAKER and was published in 1880. There is 1 senior Library assistant , 1 Librarian and 4 part time assistants. About 5% to 10% of the books in the Library are stolen each year. The Library was opened in July 1971 and the books in Cheshire are catalogued on computer.
